price: ¡Oh, creyentes! Tengan presente a Dios en todo momento,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ ذِكۡرٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū udh'kurū al-laha dhik'ran kathīran
